toc.value: Next.js를 통해 얻는 가장 큰 장점은?

prev.title: Introducing Multi-part Posts with Nested Routing
prev.summary: The blog template supports posts in nested sub-folders. This can be used to group posts of similar content e.g. a multi-part course. This post is itself an example of a nested route!

next.title: Sample .md file
next.summary: Example of a markdown file with code blocks and syntax highlighting
